text: Kim Ryon-hyang (born 4 May 1992) is a North Korean alpine skier. She competed in slalom and giant slalom at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:North Korean female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of North Korea Category:Alpine skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics
title: Kim Ryon-hyang
